title: CAPSTONE MENTORS HELP PLEASE FOR CSE
content: we are interested in machine learning and these are the mentors that we thought we would reach out to, please help us out if they are fine or if there's someone else too, please mention them.

comments.body:
No Mamatha HR??

All are pretty solid,I’m unsure about nagegowda and Ramamoorthy.

The best out of these lot are definitely 

Gowri Srinivasa
Shylaja SS
Bhaskarjyoti Das 


In terms of connections and overall helpfulness 

Shylaja has insane industry connections as well as CCBD/CDSAML resources 

Gowri is by far one of the best profs in PES as both a teacher and knowledge wise,her LoR is often one of the driving factors into getting into CMU if you’re interested in that
